CREATE TABLE connections(
    line = 'connection from ([0-9.]+) \\((.+)?\\) at ([a-zA-Z]+) ([a-zA-Z]+) ([0-9]+) ([0-9]+):([0-9]+):([0-9]+) ([0-9]+)',

    line[1] => ip TEXT,
    line[2] => hostname TEXT,
    line[9] => year INT,
    line[4] => month TEXT,
    line[5] => day INT,
    line[6] => hour INT,
    line[7] => minute INT,
    line[8] => second INT
);
